findings.title: Highly permissive owner access
findings.description: All token transfers can be stopped by owners at any time by using closeCrowdsale(false). Only the crowdsale address can run this function, but owners can change the crowdsale address.

findings.title: Logic error
findings.description: At the end of the first phase of sales, the number of unsold tokens may be less than possible to buy according to the minimumBuyAmount. In this case, no one will be able to buy the remaining tokens of the first phase, and the second phase will never begin.
